c74object.name: bl.p.rand
c74object.digest: Step randomly in a pattern sequence
c74object.description: Generates an event stream where each consecutive output is a randomly chosen element in the sequence defined as a list of arguments. Inspired by PRand in SuperCollider.

objarg.name: name
objarg.digest: The name of this bl.p.rand instance.

objarg.name: sequence
objarg.description: For nested elements type the bl.p.object in square brackets, like: [bl.p.rand nested 1 2 3] //// For optional exclusion from the random choice enclose the element in parentheses, like: 1 (2) 3 -- where "2" can be excluded. //// For subsequences enclose several elements in double parentheses, like: 1 ((2 3 4)) 5 -- where "2 3 4" is a subsequence.
